confirmation.subject: Welcome to Nice App! Confirm your Email
confirmation.confirmationDescription: Please click below to confirm your email
confirmation.ignoreDescription: If you didn’t sign up for this event, please ignore this email.

event.subject: Your Event Invitation
event.inviteDescription:
We’re excited to invite you to our biggest industry event of the year . During the event you’ll hear from 
  guest speakers and have a chance to network in special evening
  events.
event.eventGift: Get your early bird ticket today for only $100.! Prices are going up on today.
